title: The Last marsh
brief_description: A photographic record of one of the last great urban marshes, the Powderhorn Marsh, filled in 1968 to constitute an urban intersection in Chicago. The destruction of the marsh raises many ecological questions. Must encroaching urbanisation continue to disrupt natural wildlife preserves?
